Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItem
    Use DiskFileItem instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItemFactory
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload
    Use ServletFileUpload together with DiskFileItemFactory instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItemFactory.createItem(String, String, boolean, String)
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.getFileItemFactory()
    Use FileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.getRepositoryPath()
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.getSizeThreshold()
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.entities.UserSession.isBot()
    use JForumExecutionContext.getForumContext().isBot() instead Checks if it's a bot
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.FileUploadBase.isMultipartContent(HttpServletRequest)
    Use the method on ServletFileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.FileUploadBase.parseRequest(HttpServletRequest)
    Use the method in ServletFileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.parseRequest(HttpServletRequest, int, long, String)
    Use ServletFileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.view.forum.UserAction.searchKarma()
    probably will be removed. Use KarmaAction to load Karma
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.setFileItemFactory(FileItemFactory)
    Use FileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.setRepositoryPath(String)
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload.setSizeThreshold(int)
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItem(String, String, boolean, String, int, File)
    Use DiskFileItem instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItemFactory()
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DefaultFileItemFactory(int, File)
    Use DiskFileItemFactory instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload()
    Use FileUpload instead.
    net.jforum.util.legacy.commons.fileupload.DiskFileUpload(DefaultFileItemFactory)
    Use FileUpload instead.
